dict.acceptation: 擦，摩擦；用…擦；触怒；（使）相互磨擦；
接触，摩擦；擦伤；在困境中持续下去；
摩擦的动作；表面不平；阻碍，困难；

sent.orig: Palm rub root of law, palm rub the law.
I am going to France; I must rub up my French. (rub up)
sent.trans: 我要去法国了。我得把法语温习一下。

sent.orig: There's the rub / Therein lies the rub.
With finger, gently rub on lips as needed: rub lightly for daily exfoliation and conditioning.
sent.trans: 用手指轻轻在唇部按摩。可以每天使用。

sent.orig: But maternal crus is gotten by rub however red, rub reached blood, took off a skin.
sent.trans: 可母亲的小腿却被搓得红了，搓得出了血、脱了皮。
